ITEMIZE.label: DEFINITION

ITEM.label: graphics: Scilab mlist, Scicos graphics data structure defined by the

ITEMIZE.ITEM: formal name 'graphics' and containing the following fields:

ITEMIZE.label: FIELDS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : 2 x 1 vector, the coordinate of down-left point of the block shape.
: vector [w,h], where w is the width and h the height of the block shape.

: boolean, the block orientation. if true the input ports are on the left of the box and output ports are on the right. if false the input ports are on the right of the box and output ports are on the left.
: column vector of strings, contains expressions answered by the user at block set time.
: column vector of integers. If pin(k)<>0 then kth input port is connected to the block numbered pin(k), else the port is unconnected. If no input port exist pin==[].
: column vector of integers. If pout(k)<>0 then kth output port is connected to the block numbered pout(k), else the port is unconnected. If no output port exist pout==[].
: column vector of ones. If pein(k)<>0 then kth event input port is connected to the block numbered pein(k), else the port is unconnected. If no event input port exist pein==[].
: column vector of integers. If peout(k)<>0 then kth event output port is connected to the block numbered peout(k), else the port is unconnected. If no event output port exist peout==[].
: column vector of strings, contains Scilab instructions used to customize the block graphical aspect. This field may be set with "Icon" sub_menu.
: Character string used for identification (if any)

DESCRIPTION.P: Scicos block graphics data structure contains all information relative to graphical display of the block and to user dialogue. Fields may be fixed by block definition or set as a result of user dialogue or connections.
